title: Universal Internet Access
description: As of 2023, 100% of Bahrain's population, including both male and female individuals, have access to the internet, showcasing the country's commitment to digital connectivity.

title: High Import of Ores and Metals
description: In 2023, ores and metals constituted 20.47% of Bahrain's merchandise imports, indicating a significant reliance on these resources for industrial and economic activities.

title: Complete Newborn Tetanus Protection
description: Bahrain achieved a 100% vaccination rate against tetanus for newborns in 2023, reflecting the country's strong healthcare initiatives for infants.

title: Minimal Intentional Homicides
description: With a rate of 0.068 homicides per 100,000 people in 2021, Bahrain is among the countries with the lowest intentional homicide rates globally.

title: Limited Renewable Freshwater Resources
description: In 2021, Bahrain's renewable internal freshwater resources were only 0.004 billion cubic meters, highlighting a critical scarcity of natural water resources.

title: Low Fertilizer Consumption
description: Bahrain's fertilizer consumption was just 0.06% of its production in 2022, suggesting a limited use of fertilizers in agricultural practices.

title: Low Vocational Education Enrollment for Females
description: In 2018, only 8.13% of female students were enrolled in vocational secondary education, indicating a potential area for educational development.

title: Minimal Tax Revenue from Income and Profits
description: In 2020, Bahrain collected 6,637,382 local currency units from taxes on income, profits, and capital gains, reflecting a relatively low tax revenue stream.

title: Negative Other Expenses
description: In 2015, Bahrain reported negative values for other expenses both in current local currency and as a percentage of total expenses, indicating potential financial adjustments or corrections.

title: Favorable PPP Conversion Factor
description: In 2023, Bahrain's PPP conversion factor was 0.173, suggesting a favorable exchange rate for international economic comparisons.
